name: logto
description: Logto is an identity and user management platform tailored for modern apps. It provides authentication, authorization, SSO, and built-in UI components while supporting self-hosting as well as cloud deployments.
features: Authentication: OAuth 2.0, OIDC support, Social login providers. Secure user authentication for modern apps.
User Management: User profiles, Role-based access, Permission control. Manage identities centrally.
Single Sign-On: SSO across applications, Session management, Unified login. One login for all your apps.
Built-In UI: Pre-built login pages, Customizable themes, Mobile-responsive. Ready-to-use authentication UI.
Multi-Tenant: Organization support, Tenant isolation, Custom branding. Build SaaS applications easily.
API Access: RESTful APIs, SDKs for popular frameworks, Webhook support. Integrate authentication programmatically.
Security: MFA support, Password policies, Audit logs. Enterprise-grade security features.
Self-Hosted: Full data control, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Own your identity infrastructure.
